attributes.name: multiple
attributes.deprecatedMessage: use zui-select-dropdown or other similar components

properties.name: multiple
properties.deprecatedMessage: use zui-select-dropdown or other similar components

tags.name: zui-select-dropdown
tags.description: `<zui-select-dropdown>` is an evolved `<zui-select>` that supports multiselect, typeahead, tagging, grouping, and asynchronous option retrieval. All properties are optional.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Text to show within input when no options selected

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.description: Allow multiple options to be selected

attributes.name: searchable
attributes.description: Allow typing a search term within the input to filter options

attributes.name: debounce
attributes.description: Delay in milliseconds after typing before retrieving options

attributes.name: typeahead
attributes.description: Emphasize parts of the option text after typing that were not typed

attributes.name: taggable
attributes.description: Allow creating the desired option after typing if no option matches the search term

attributes.name: taggable-label
attributes.description: Text to show on the taggable option before the search term; default "Create"

attributes.name: ungrouped-label
attributes.description: The name of the group to contain options that are not contained within another group when groups are present; default "Other"

attributes.name: no-results-message
attributes.description: The message to appear if a group contains no options

attributes.name: queryHandler
attributes.description:
An alternative or supplementary way to retrieve options.
Must be a function that accepts a string argument and an optional array argument of `ZuiOptionObject` elements.
Must return a promise that resolves to a list of strings or objects with a `label` property and optional `value`, `disabled`, and/or `group` properties.
The search term will be passed to the first argument and the existing options will be passed to the second argument.
attributes.type: ((query: string, options?: ZuiOptionObject[] | undefined) => (string | IZuiOptionObject)[] | Promise<(string | IZuiOptionObject)[]>) | undefined

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: Text to show within input when no options selected

properties.name: multiple
properties.description: Allow multiple options to be selected

properties.name: searchable
properties.description: Allow typing a search term within the input to filter options

properties.name: debounce
properties.description: Delay in milliseconds after typing before retrieving options

properties.name: typeahead
properties.description: Emphasize parts of the option text after typing that were not typed

properties.name: taggable
properties.description: Allow creating the desired option after typing if no option matches the search term

properties.name: taggableLabel
properties.description: Text to show on the taggable option before the search term; default "Create"

properties.name: ungroupedLabel
properties.description: The name of the group to contain options that are not contained within another group when groups are present; default "Other"

properties.name: noResultsMessage
properties.description: The message to appear if a group contains no options

properties.name: queryHandler
properties.description:
An alternative or supplementary way to retrieve options.
Must be a function that accepts a string argument and an optional array argument of `ZuiOptionObject` elements.
Must return a promise that resolves to a list of strings or objects with a `label` property and optional `value`, `disabled`, and/or `group` properties.
The search term will be passed to the first argument and the existing options will be passed to the second argument.
properties.type: ((query: string, options?: ZuiOptionObject[] | undefined) => (string | IZuiOptionObject)[] | Promise<(string | IZuiOptionObject)[]>) | undefined

events.name: query
events.description: on search term typed in the input. if debounce > 0, only fires after timeout

slots.description: Unnamed slot - optionally pass `<zui-option` or `<zui-option-group>` elements
